actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for amendment of the Jury Selection and Service Act of 1968, as amended, adding further definitions relating to jury selection by electronic data processing.

summary.text: Adds definitions relating to jury selection by electronic data processing to the terms defined under the jury Selection and Service Act of 1968.

titles.title: A bill to provide for amendment of the Jury Selection and Service Act of 1968, as amended, adding further definitions relating to jury selection by electronic data processing.
